decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

24-035-E01 (Existing OS Plan), 24-035-E02 (Existing Ground Plan), 24-035-E03 (Existing First Floor Plan), 24-035-E04 (Existing Roof Plan), 24-035-E05 (Existing Elevation A (North Facing)), 24-035-E06 (Existing Elevation B (East Facing)), 24-035-E07 (Existing Elevation C (South Facing)), 24-035-E08 (Existing Elevation D (West Facing)), 24-035-P00 (Proposed Location Plan), 24-035-P01 (Proposed OS Plan), 24-035-P02 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 24-035-P03 (Proposed First Floor Plan), 24-035-P04 (Proposed Roof Plan), 24-035-P05 (Proposed Elevation A (North Facing)), 24-035-P06 (Proposed Elevation B (East Facing)), 24-035-P07 (Proposed Elevation C (South Facing)), 24-035-P08 (Proposed Elevation D (West Facing)) and Design and Access Statement dated June 2024

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent Order revoking or reenacting that Order), no external alterations or extensions shall be made to the single storey dwelling house hereby approved, and no buildings, enclosures, or swimming pools falling under Part 1, Class E of the Order shall be erected within the curtilage of the dwellinghouse, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority through the submission of a planning application.

Reason: To ensure the high-quality design of the development is preserved and to safeguard the amenities of the area, in accordance with Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021), and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19).
description: Part first floor front extension; part roof extension to main roof; and creation of second floor roof terrace (following removal of existing roof terrace)
